linkedin_data.profile_overview: An open-source, scalable, feeless, green & permissionless distributed ledger.
linkedin_data.profile_bio:
IOTA Foundation is a non-profit organization and creator of the Tangle, a permissionless, multi-dimensional distributed ledger, designed as a foundation of a global protocol for all things connected. 

Led by a team of talented developers and passionate industry experts, IOTA developed an advanced ledger that moves beyond Blockchain to effectively address the challenges of scalability, energy resource requirements and data security, as well as transaction fees. 

With this groundbreaking architecture, the open-source Tangle ecosystem is designed to become the catalyst for new economic systems and business models enabling a convergence of several key vertical industries, including supply chain, mobility and automotive, eHealth as well as smart energy/connected cities.

We are constantly looking for talents. Check our website to see the current open positions: www.iota.org/the-foundation/work-at-the-iota-foundation

[ICYMI] Missed#ZebraDevCon2023? You can now watchJosé Manuel Cantera Fonseca's presentation on Digital Product Passports.Zebra Developersand#IOTAare building DPPs based on transparent and trustful value chains. Learn how!
🔗https://lnkd.in/dtFercBZDigital Product Passports (#DPPs) are pivotal for a#CircularEconomy& realizing new product policies. They offer machine-readable insights into a product's origin, durability, composition, reuse, repair, and end-of-life handling. Unleash the potential of DPPs!

IOTA powers ecosystems of trust via the#Tangle, a scalable, feeless, and secure DLT. Acting as a verifiable data registry and decentralized public key infrastructure,#IOTAenables a new era of trust and transparency in digital landscapes - the ideal foundation for DPPs.#IOTAand Zebra empower devs with:
💪 Trust Frameworks using Verifiable Credentials via IOTA Identity Framework
💪 Zebra-IOTA Edge SDK merging the#Tanglewith RFID Readers or Datawedge
💪 Platform components for DPP solutions relying on trust and data decentralization

For more information on our collaboration to build DPPs check out the presentation slides here ⬇️https://lnkd.in/d94DdTCE

Visit the link below to explore the extensive collection of academic papers published by the incredible researchers at#IOTA📃👇https://lnkd.in/ewmZrH9K

Just recently, at theBDZ event | The foremost Web3 event in Spanish,José Manuel Cantera, fromIOTAemphasized the pivotal role of blockchain as a fundamental 'digital notary' in fostering relationships among businesses, consumers, and governments. He underscored its capacity to instill transparency and trust within these processes. 1,104 followers En la mesa redonda sobre "𝗔𝗽𝗹𝗶𝗰𝗮𝗰𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗲𝘀 𝗱𝗲 𝗯𝗹𝗼𝗰𝗸𝗰𝗵𝗮𝗶𝗻 𝘆 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴í𝗮𝘀 𝗱𝗲 𝗿𝗲𝗴𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗼 𝗱𝗶𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗯𝘂𝗶𝗱𝗼 𝗲𝗻 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗰𝗲𝘀𝗼𝘀 𝘆 𝗽𝗿𝗼𝗱𝘂𝗰𝘁𝗼𝘀 𝗶𝗻𝗱𝘂𝘀𝘁𝗿𝗶𝗮𝗹𝗲𝘀", auspiciada por el Gobierno de Aragón, se abordaron temas cruciales sobre la integración de estas tecnologías en la industria.José Manuel Cantera, deIOTA- EBSI PCP, destacó el papel del blockchain como un "notario digital" esencial en las relaciones entre negocios, consumidores y gobiernos, subrayando su capacidad para aportar transparencia y confianza en estos procesos. 🌐Juan José González, deSepter Krinein, enfatizó cómo la industria busca eficiencias y nuevos ingresos a través de blockchain. Puso como ejemplo la validación de la calidad en procesos de soldadura industrial, donde la tecnología blockchain garantiza la seguridad y privacidad de la información crítica. 🏭

Por su parte,Julio ModregodeAirfal International, ilustró el uso de blockchain en la trazabilidad y certificación de la cadena de valor en la fabricación de iluminación. Este enfoque no solo mejora la sostenibilidad del producto, sino que también asegura su calidad y seguridad. 💡

La moderadoraMar Paños, Directora General de Promoción Industrial e Innovación enGobierno de Aragón - Government of Aragon, guió la discusión hacia cómo la administración puede fomentar el uso del blockchain en la industria. Se destacó la importancia de la formación, la divulgación y la creación de un entorno regulador favorable para superar el miedo y la resistencia al cambio. 📚

Este encuentro resaltó la versatilidad del blockchain en diferentes sectores industriales, demostrando su capacidad para mejorar procesos, aumentar la eficiencia y garantizar la seguridad de los datos en un mundo cada vez más digitalizado. 🌍🔗#BDZ2023#Web3#Blockchain#BDZdrop#Seguridad

Wishing the#IOTACommunity a fantastic New Year! 🎊
Thank you for being an integral part of our journey to decentralization and#DigitalAutonomy❤️ ️
Here's to another year of growth, collaboration, and achieving new milestones together.

As we wave goodbye to 2023, let's rewind the game-changing moments that reshaped our tech landscape. From#ShimmerEVM, testnet triumphs, introducing IOTA 2.0 and our vibrant ecosystem, we're gearing up for an exhilarating year ahead! 👇🧵
🔗https://lnkd.in/dav7cSqy1/ This year marked a significant chapter for IOTA with the introduction of#ShimmerEVM, bringing#DeFito the IOTA ecosystem. Let's explore the impact ShimmerEVM has had on our vibrant ecosystem👇

2/ The ShimmerEVM testnet, launched in March, recorded over 1 million transactions within 1 month. In May, the Treasures of Shimmercampaign added over 10 million transactions, highlighting the testnet's robustness💪

3/ The release of ShimmerEVM in September led to a massive surge in Total Value Locked (TVL), reaching $4.8 million in October. Fun Fact: our ever-expanding ecosystem now boasts 40 active projects 👏

4/ In December, ShimmerEVM integrated withLayerZero Labs, extending its reach in the broader crypto space & fostering seamless cross-chain communication ⚡

5/ In preparation for 2024, we laid the groundwork for#IOTA2.0 with extensive content introducing the protocol upgrade. What's more: the Stardust upgrade in October brought a tokenization framework to the IOTA mainnet, allowing anyone to mint tokenized assets on L1 🪙

6/ This year, IOTA also made waves in the UAE with the creation of the IOTA Ecosystem DLT Foundation, registered withAbu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM). Ready to spark growth, it's on a mission to cultivate the IOTA ecosystem across the Middle East, Africa, and Asia🌐

7/ Finally, 2023 saw the adoption of#MiCAin the EU, providing much-needed clarity to the crypto industry. The IOTA Foundation actively promoted regulatory frameworks, organized roundtables, and remains committed to ongoing regulatory advocacy efforts 🤝

8/ With L2 EVM-compatible smart contracts hitting the mainnet, the#IOTA2.0 testnet launch, and the integration of smart contracts into IOTA's L1 on the horizon, the future looks incredibly promising. Buckle up, everybody! ✨

Tangleverse is getting bigger & better in 2024 🤩 Find out what's new about Tangleverse 2.0 and how it wants to grow the#IOTAand Shimmerecosystem👇

Parallel transaction processing in IOTA #2.0 offers several benefits that enhance the value and importance of the technology. Watch the video on how it works, and read the summary below:

📈 Unlocking Scalability: parallel transaction processing allows#IOTAto handle a significantly larger number of transactions simultaneously, catering to high-volume demands without sacrificing performance.
⏱️ Faster Transaction Confirmation: With parallel processing, transactions can be confirmed more quickly. This is especially valuable in scenarios where timely transaction verification is essential, such as supply chain management, real-time payments & more.
🌐 Network Efficiency: By distributing the transaction processing load across multiple nodes, the network becomes more efficient and resilient. Congestion & bottlenecks are prevented, ensuring that the network functions even during activity surges. 
🤝 Enhanced Reliability: Even if some nodes experience issues or downtime, the network as a whole can continue functioning, thanks to the distributed processing approach. This fault tolerance contributes to a more robust and dependable ecosystem.
📦 Support for Complex Use Cases: Parallel processing opens the door to to use cases like multi-party interactions and interdependent transactions. This opens up possible innovations in the#SupplyChain&#Defiindustries
🌱 Future-Proofing via Scalability:#IOTA2.0's integration of parallel processing isn't just about today's requirements—it's a strategic anticipation of tomorrow's demands, essential for the long-term sustainability and growth of any#DLT.

Do you want to dig deeper into#IOTA2.0's parallel processing structure? Read more herehttps://lnkd.in/d8z8TPAy

CongratulationsDemiaon this new development! We can't wait to witness the positive impact you'll make on the planet for the greater good.#sustainablility#postiveaction#climateaction 97 followers We are thrilled to announce our collaboration with theThe HBAR Foundation! At Demia, we're committed to bridging blockchain technologies to address vital sustainability and climate data challenges and enable trust in data.

By joining forces with#HBAR, we're bridging technologies and creating a harmonious ecosystem for solving critical environmental data issues. This step is a testament to the power of collaboration for a regenerative future.

As a solution built onIOTA, Demia brings unique strengths to the table - feeless, scalable, parallel data with granular data control and confidence. Our years of work on enabling measurable data confidence withDell TechnologiesonProject Alvariumwill be part of these integrations. And now we're excited to bring these capabilities to theHederaecosystem. 

Our integration withHederais a strategic step toward our goal of building bridges across chains. We grow together - by combining our strengths to tackle global sustainability and climate challenges for the ultimate ecosystem.

With Demia's Zero-Trust Data Model, we're enhancing the security and reliability of data in carbon markets. This is crucial in elevating trust and the overall value of#carboncredits. We are proud to be part of this transformative journey.

At the same time, we're ensuring that project operators have the ultimate say in who can access their data. With Demia's Zero-Trust Data Fabric, tools, and managed services, they have full transparency on who needs access to their data and for what purpose.

Our collaboration is a beacon of hope for a more collaborative and regenerative future. By bridgingIOTAandHedera's Guardian, we're unlocking new possibilities for sustainable development and climate action.

We're just getting started on this exciting journey withThe HBAR Foundation. Stay tuned for more updates as we innovate and build solutions for a greener, more sustainable world.#Collaboration#Sustainability#ClimateAction#ReFi#IOTAStrong#TrustInData#Unity#TechForGood#ZeroTrust#TransparencyMatters#GreenTech#SustainabilityInAction#RegenerativeFuture

IOTA is the first#DLTFoundation regulated withAbu Dhabi Global Market (ADGM)in 🇦🇪! The new#IOTAFoundation will be seeded with over $100 million in $IOTA tokens to support and accelerate the growth of the IOTA ecosystem.https://lnkd.in/d-w7cCBnWith new headquarters in the UAE, IOTA will evolve from being an enterprise DLT network, to becoming a competitive L1 Blockchain in#Web3and#Crypto. In Q1, IOTA will become fully EVM-compatible, opening the gates to a thriving#DeFi, Gaming and dApp ecosystem.

Through IOTA's work with#ADGMand other regulators in the Middle East, IOTA will help to shape the future of Crypto and create the necessary infrastructure to onboard institutional investors and billions of assets to be tokenized and traded on IOTA. The first RWA assets are expected to launch in Q1. Since 2015, IOTA's extensive history and collaboration with enterprises and governments uniquely position us to market entry, ready to work with them to build solutions for a better tomorrow. Our HQ in the UAE will prioritize expansion in key markets such as Africa & Asia. 

We are deeply committed to the UAE & we are grateful for this opportunity to prove our value to the country. A large portion of our token treasury will be used to promote our ecosystem and helping innovators globally to build on IOTA and to operate out of the UAE 🇦🇪. This marks the beginning of a new chapter in the history of IOTA: the one where we focus on gaining market share, competing in the Crypto markets and positioning IOTA as one of the leading crypto projects in the world 🌐.

🌐It's time to cover an#IOTA2.0 key feature:#Mana. Say goodbye to value extraction and inflation! Our approach aims to fosters long-term investment, sustainably 🌱. But how does Mana enable this? And how do you obtain it? Watch the video and read further.

Firstly, everyone - validators and users alike, is rewarded with Mana. Even the simplest act of holding tokens generates Mana rewards, since you are a part of the IOTA ecosystem through long-term investment. 

Next way to earn Mana is by actively participating in IOTA 2.0 as a validator. Anyone can validate: all you need is to run a node and stake any amount of $IOTA tokens, and you contribute directly to the network's security.

Finally: you don't want to go all in, but still want support IOTA 2.0's decentralization? There's an in-between solution just for you. Delegate your Mana to a validator, and for this action, receive your share of Mana in return. 

How much? You can find out yourself using the Mana Rewards Calculator.  See what you can earn through these 3 methods over time: 🔗https://lnkd.in/de42mAhz. Still need to learn more? Head on over to the blogpost detailing IOTA 2.0's tokenomics: 🔗https://lnkd.in/dDzphkjZOr, head over to YouTube to watch all the videos: 🔗https://lnkd.in/dGsCde4J

🌐In#IOTA2.0, you’re incentivized to support the network in two ways: either by validating blocks or delegating your voting power, thanks to#Mana. Here's how it works ⬇️

Validating: anyone can become a validator. All you need is to run a node and temporarily lock up $IOTA tokens. Validators play a crucial role verifying and confirming transactions, enhancing trust and reliability in the network. Once you've become a validator, you have a chance to become part of a voting committee. Your voting power is determined by the amount of locked up $IOTA tokens you have.
Why become a validator? As you validate transactions and contribute to the network's security, you are compensated for your efforts with Mana. This additional stream of Mana can be used to perform more transactions, by gaining more throughput on the network.

You can also support the network by delegating your voting power to validators. It's a simple & rewarding way to participate in the network. You earn passive Mana, support network decentralization & contribute to protocol governance without the need of extra technical knowledge.

 To understand more about validating and delegating, read the full blog post here:https://lnkd.in/dDzphkjZ

Our outstanding partnerTradeMark Africaplays an important role in the efforts to empower African traders through digital innovation. The Trade and Logistics Information Pipeline (https://www.tlip.io) developed on the#IOTATangle is one of the key initiatives through which Trademark Africa seeks to revolutionize cross-border trade in the region, making it inclusive for all businesses, no matter their size.#InternationalDevelopment#Africa#Trade#SupplyChain 21,229 followers Last week, at theWorld Trade OrganizationChair's International Conference on Digital Trade - The Way Forward, TMA Director of Digital TradeErick Siralidelved into the role of the African Union's (AU) Digital Transformation Strategy and theAfrican Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA) Secretariatin shaping Africa's digital trade landscape. The AU's strategy is focused on creating a digitally empowered Africa, where connectivity is a reality for everyone. Alongside this, the AfCFTA is working towards a single digital market, aiming to ease cross-border trade. A key component of this plan is the AfCFTA's Digital Trade Protocol, a groundbreaking initiative that is currently under development, which seeks to standardise regulations across the continent, thereby boosting digital trade in goods and services.

As e-commerce rises and digital technologies become more ingrained in our daily lives, Africa stands on the cusp of a digital revolution and is well-positioned to benefit from these initiatives. These initiatives are more than just policies; they are keys that will open new markets for African businesses, expand customer bases, enhance their competitiveness, and provide a platform for entrepreneurs, especially women and youth, to thrive in the digital economy by equipping them with necessary tools to participate in a digital economy. 
 
So, where does TradeMark Africa (TMA) fit into this? In this evolving scenario, TMA is actively working to create a favorable digital trade environment through innovation. This includes supporting digital services from public agencies, offering digital skills training, and promoting private sector-friendly digital technologies. TMA's work is about bridging the digital divide and enhancing Africa's participation in the global digital economy. “We are ensuring that businesses aren’t just trading but trading smartly and efficiently,” asserted Sirali. 
 
TMA’s initiatives go beyond traditional methods. We're exploring new technologies like distributed ledger technologies (DLT) (for example Trade Logistics Information Pipeline withIOTA-https://www.tlip.io/) and focusing on building digital capacity among Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs). Most importantly TMA advocates for inclusive digital policies, ensuring that all stakeholders, are involved in shaping the future of digital trade. “It’s not just about moving forward; it’s about ensuring that everyone, including marginalised groups, has a say in the direction we’re headed,” said Sirali. Operating in 14 countries across Africa, TMA collaborates with local service providers to maximise its impact, aiming for sustainable digital trade development across the continent.

linkedin_data.overall_prompt_summary: The posts collectively cover various aspects of the cryptocurrency sector, such as regulation, technological advancements, influencer identification, and keyword analysis. They provide insights into themes like SEC's Bitcoin ETF approval, the launch of technological initiatives, and the influence of key figures in the cryptocurrency community. One significant issue noted is the focus on regulatory progress and technological innovation, highlighting the sector's evolving nature. Another important aspect is the identification of influencers and the analysis of commonly used keywords, indicating the topics and figures that drive engagement in the cryptocurrency community. A potential improvement could involve a deeper analysis of the impacts of these developments on the market and consumer sentiment, providing a more comprehensive view of the sector's dynamics.

prompts_output.Output: The posts fall into themes of regulation (e.g., SEC's Bitcoin ETF approval), technological advancements (IOTA 2.0 upgrade, DLT foundation launch), and strategic expansions (IOTA's Middle East initiatives). They focus on regulatory progress, tech innovation, and market expansion in the cryptocurrency sector.

The most engaged posts in the cryptocurrency space are from accounts discussing significant developments, like the launch of a $100-million DLT foundation in Abu Dhabi, IOTA's expansion, and SEC's approval of Bitcoin ETFs. These accounts, often associated with key company figures or major news, have high engagement and follower interest, indicating their influence in the crypto community.

The most frequently used keywords in the LinkedIn posts related to cryptocurrencies include 'digital,' 'blockchain,' 'trade,' and 'mana.' These terms are relevant as they indicate a focus on digital innovation, blockchain technology, trading aspects, and possibly specific aspects of IOTA's technology ('mana'). Their frequent use suggests an emphasis on technological advancement and trading in the context of cryptocurrencies.

The posts reflect investor interest in innovation, DeFi developments, and partnerships. Concerns about technology's robustness and potential for sustainable growth in the crypto market are implicit. Expectations are high for secure, advanced platforms and clear, sustainable strategies in the evolving cryptocurrency landscape.

Based on the provided data, there are no evident posts containing misinformation or speculative claims about cryptocurrencies. The content focuses on company updates, technological advancements, and educational information, maintaining a factual and informative tone without speculative or misleading statements.

The company's LinkedIn posts highlight technological advancements, community surveys, educational initiatives, strategic partnerships, and sustainability efforts. There's a strong focus on growth and innovation, with no mention of controversies or specific milestones.

Based on the analysis of the 'extracted_posts' section from the LinkedIn data, there are no evident patterns or strategies that resemble known cryptocurrency manipulation tactics such as pump-and-dump or Ponzi schemes. The posts mainly focus on community engagement, information sharing, and updates about IOTA's activities and developments.

The analysis revealed 70 instances of repetitive phrasing in the posts, which could indicate automated generation. However, there were no signs of high posting frequency or generic content typical of bot activity. While some bot-like characteristics are present, it's not conclusive evidence of posts being generated by bots or automated accounts.

Out of the analyzed posts, 20 contain invite links to cryptocurrency channels or groups. These links could potentially play a role in manipulation schemes by directing audiences to channels where such activities might occur. However, without examining the specific nature and content of these channels or groups, it's not conclusive to label them as part of manipulation schemes.

The posts reflect market trends in regulatory compliance, technological innovation, and strategic growth. This indicates a strong focus on technological developments in the context of cryptocurrencies, with significant attention to market trends and community engagement. Less emphasis is placed on direct investment advice. This categorization suggests an approach aimed at informing and engaging the community, primarily through technological updates and market insights.
